title: 怎么禁止玩家afk权限
author: Tangao125
txt_content:
玩家一直afk
搞得很烦

replies.author: Enron233
replies.txt_content:
你好 LZ的基础是Ess吗？ 如果是的话 请打开 plugins\GroupManager\globalgroups.yml 往下滑 会有
  g:essentials_builder:
    permissions:
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.afk.auto复制代码

直接删除
    
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.afk.auto复制代码
这两行就OK拉

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content: 下掉玩家组的essentials.afk 权限

replies.author: Tangao125
replies.txt_content:
HTL9257 发表于 2019-2-23 17:54
下掉玩家组的essentials.afk 权限
下掉没用，还是可以

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
Tangao125 发表于 2019-2-23 17:56
下掉没用，还是可以
游戏版本？ 1.13GM插件有改不了权限的BUG 得用luckperm

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
添加反权限
/mangaddp builder -essentials.afk复制代码
